meanings.definition: Distinguishing or differentiating between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The red apple was distincter than the green one.
meanings.sent2: Her distincter voice stood out in the choir.
meanings.sent3: The distincter stripes on the zebra made it look like a barcode.
meanings.sent4: The distincter smell of fresh bread filled the bakery.
meanings.sent5: The distincter taste of the lemonade made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: More distinct or clear in comparison to something else.
meanings.sent1: The distincter path led us straight to the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The distincter details in the painting made it a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The distincter sound of the doorbell made the dog bark excitedly.
meanings.sent4: The distincter stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The distincter colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
